name: Battlefield (itch) (Mauricio Miranda)
description:
A third-person shooter, where the player must eliminate 10 enemies located throughout the level. The player has only one type of weapon, but unlimited ammunition. Enemies will chase the player if seen, and will return to their original post if they lose sight of the player.

Developed in Unreal Engine using C++.

https://github.com/MauricioMirandaDev/Battlefield
